settings.subtitle: The world’s #1 anti-aging skincare regimen
settings.title: Visible Results In Weeks
settings.text: Luxurious, superior quality, medical-grade skincare by the leading plastic surgeon Dr. Cat

settings.description: “I have been using MD glam for over 3 years. I do suffer from rosacea, therefore I have to be very careful with the products that I apply in my face. MD glam products are amazing. I always had issues with other sunscreens but not the MD glam. I apply it daily and it keeps my face calm and protected. There are no bumps and my face doesn’t get irritated.”

“I didn’t realize how visible my pores and red uneven skin tone were getting because usually I’d wear foundation or a filter and it would be covered. Since using MD GLAM Anti-Aging Kit my pores aren’t apparent, the redness has gone and my skin looks more youthful and glowing!”

“I have been using MD glam daily since October 20, 2017. The difference was obvious 7 days after which I documented in a photo. I began with the daily day and night cream and pore foaming cleanser and the scrub twice a week  I then added the sunscreen and eye serum. I will be 48 in a few days and couldn't be more proud of my skin.”

“My skin has been feeling it from all of the traveling and movies I filmed this year, so I tried two weeks of using it and my skin feels so soft and hydrated. This kit was exactly what my skin needed!”

settings.title: Suitable for Ages 20-65+
settings.subtitle: Before & after photos by real MD GLAM users. Results may vary.

settings.title: Dr. Cat
settings.subtitle: Beverly Hills Plastic Surgeon & MD GLAM creator
settings.text:
Dr. Cat has dedicated her life to helping women feel and look their best. Her message to the world embodies the essence of self-compassion and self-care. Dr. Cat’s extensive scientific research in anti-aging and skincare started after majoring with honors in Molecular and Cellular Biology at Harvard.

After a successful career in Plastic Surgery and many years of research she decided to launch MD GLAM - a natural evolutionary process of her passion for beauty and anti-aging. The complexity of her beauty journey was narrowed down to a simple skincare philosophy; create simple, effective, safe, feel good, smell good, skinare regimen that really works.

settings.subtitle: SUNSHOUT SUNSCREEN SPF 50
settings.text:
Powerful and effective broad-spectrum UVA/UVB sun protection prevents sunburn, sun spots, laxity, rough texture, and other not-so-sunny side effects of UV overexposure.

Infused with an innovative blend of powerful antioxidants and skin-soothing, essential extracts, this exclusive, supercharged sunscreen preserves, perfects, AND protects from the sands to the street. Weightless, non-greasy, fast absorbing formula effortlessly vanishes into skin, leaving an undetectable, flawless finish.

settings.subtitle: Hyaluronic acid night c-complex
settings.text: Glow-getting glycolic acid refines and renews texture for a bright, beautiful, luminous complexion. Low molecular weight hyaluronic acid deeply penetrates the skin to significantly hydrate and heal the skin for a firm, more rejuvenated appearance. Exquisitely rich and undeniably luxurious, this sumptuous night cream is a dream-come-true essential for your beauty sleep.

settings.subtitle: DMAE Antioxidant Day Moisturizer: Protect your skin against toxins
settings.text: Infuse skin hydration with our rich, fluffy-light textured day cream. Formulated to help increase firmness and hydration and counters free radicals from UV exposure and other toxins in the environment. Discover why customers love it.

settings.subtitle: Exfoliating enzyme scrub
settings.text: Specially formulated by Dr. Cat with extra-fine exfoliating particles to ensure a gentle, complexion polishing treatment, your skin is left irresistibly satin-smooth and prepped for your MD Glam Hyaluronic Acid Night C-Complex. Before bed – or breakfast – be sure to get in the buff with this beauty.

settings.subtitle: Deep poor foaming cleanser
settings.text:
Minerals from the Dead Sea deeply moisturize and hydrate the complexion for a refreshing and smooth feel post-cleanse. The luxurious, fresh, foaming lather soothes and softens without stripping skin of its vital moisture. In fact, washing with this cleanser will leave your skin feeling soft, supple, and clean.
You can’t help but say “aaaaahhhh” when using this extraordinary cleanser. Yes, it’s that good.

settings.title: The Anti-aging Dream Team
settings.subtitle: Deep Pore Foaming Cleanser: Refresh skin and unclog pores
settings.text: Clarify skin and cleanse pores with our invigorating foaming cleanser formulated to wash away impurities, remove dirt, oil & makeup. Packed with minerals to detoxify skin and gentle, long-lasting moisturizers for refreshed, supple, smooth skin. Daily cleansing to rely on.

settings.title: Start Before It's Too Late
settings.subtitle: You start losing collagen in early 20s
settings.text:
Collagen production starts to decline in most people’s bodies from the time they’re in their late teens or early 20s and decreases about 1% a year. This collagen attenuation accelerates during and after menopause. Research shows, by the time you turn 50, your skin loses half of your natural collagen. Environmental exposures amplify this process.

MD GLAM products help replenish and protect the skin of its natural protectants that are depleted from environmental toxins and the aging process.
